set.name: DM-27+1D Perfect Heaven Plus One Dream

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DM-27+1D Perfect Heaven Plus One Dream

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, play Rock-Paper-Scissors with your opponent. If you win, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down, draw a card, destroy one of your opponent's creatures, choose a card in your opponent's mana zone and put it into its owner's graveyard, and put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-27+1D Perfect Heaven Plus One Dream

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ Your opponent's creatures that have power 6000 or more must attack this creature if able. {POWER ATTACKER} +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is destroyed, tap one of your opponent's creatures. Then you may return a creature in the battle zone to its owner's hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-27+1D Perfect Heaven Plus One Dream
